CustomField.description: This field provides the class name of the icon which will be displayed as well as the label of the icon when the user is hovering over the icon.
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( ampi__Data_Type__c ) = 'Number', 'vi-number-value' , IF( TEXT( ampi__Data_Type__c ) = 'Currency' , 'vi-money', IF( TEXT( ampi__Data_Type__c ) = 'Percent' , 'vi-percentage-value' , IF( TEXT( ampi__Data_Type__c ) = 'Qualitative' ,'vi-file-text-o' , IF( TEXT( ampi__Data_Type__c ) = 'Milestone' , 'vi-map-signs' , '' )))))&"#"&text(ampi__Data_Type__c)
CustomField.label: Data Type
